sn22.27:1.4: Yavata rupassa assado pannaya me so sudittho.
sn22.27:1.7: Yavata rupassa adinavo pannaya me so sudittho.
sn22.27:1.10: Yavata rupassa nissaranam pannaya me tam sudittham.
sn22.27:1.16: Yavata vinnanassa assado pannaya me so sudittho.
sn22.27:1.19: Yavata vinnanassa adinavo pannaya me so sudittho.
sn22.27:1.22: Yavata vinnanassa nissaranam pannaya me tam sudittham.
sn22.27:1.23: Yavakivancaham, bhikkhave, imesam pancannam upadanakkhandhanam assadanca assadato adinavanca adinavato nissarananca nissaranato yathabhutam nabbhannasim …pe…
sn22.27:1.26: ‘akuppa me vimutti; ayamantima jati; natthi dani punabbhavo’”ti.
